channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report X-2023121054
item.description:
Report X-2023121054

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-09
  • City: EVERETT
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: BOX WAS UNLOADED FROM TRAILER PLACED IN AUTO BAY WERE IT WAS THEN NOTICED THAT THERE WAS A STRANGE SMELL AND A CORNER OF THE BOX APPEARED DAMP. IN HOUSE RESPONDER CALLED WHO EXAMIED THE PACKAGE AND FOUND THE CAP TO BE DEFECTIVE CAUSING A SMALL LEAK.
